name: FPS Silent Assassin Missions
description:
FPS Silent Assassin Missions is a very challenging FPS action game! Get ready for the real shooting game. Kill the terrorists and clean up the city from the terrorists. You are a covert special ops soldier ready to play your part in dangerous military FPS attacks and silent assassin missions with access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to finish the job. Upgrade your sniper rifle to improve accuracy, damage and range. Take the best shot to kill and eliminate every escape crime . Attack enemy hiding in dust and sniper assassin rebellions with a realistic gun leaving no exit for the fierce killer because you are an army commando shot to perform the real mission. Being the city sniper show precise target hitting in this best shooter game. Get into this sniper shooting battle and prepare to be the last hope of the city.
Features:
- Realistic Environment.
- Thrilling action levels.
- New and latest Sniper 3D Guns.
- High quality graphics and best sound effects
- HD Graphics.
- Simple and smooth operation.
